exercise.instructions: To get information about our program variables study them further or to display a message to the user on the screen we use the action "Print". Using the above action will be using the phrase in quotes printed followed by an expression that wants to print. For example, to print to the screen the phrase Hello World!. Write down the expression print "Hello World!".

test.failure: What would be the output for "Hello"?
What would be the output for "World"?
What would be the output for "a b"?
What would be the output for "123"?

hints.hint: You should print the variable "name", using the "print" command
